about_the_game:
Dash For Your Life is a clever mix of the auto-scroller platformer, and horror genres.

Jump your way through hand designed levels while avoiding obstacles and horrifying monsters. Solve various gameplay puzzles in a timely manner while adapting to the unpredictability of the creatures hunting you.

Tension

Getting to the end of a level has never been so tense. Not only does failure reset your progress, but the sounds and presence of monsters elevates the experience to the next level. A single mistake has the chance to cause horrifying jump scares so do not hesitate or you will fail. Additionally, the pause button is disabled after getting far enough in a level to prevent the mis-use of pausing to analyze situations.

Controls and Gameplay

Understanding controls has never been so easy, as you only require one button to jump through levels and the mouse to destroy monsters.

Customization

Customize your character with up to three distinct color channels and lots of unique cube skins. Some skins even have special properties such as custom sounds, animations, shadow-casting, and more! Select between various cursors that have beautiful particle effects and satisfying sounds.
